ComicInfo.Title: Look Before You Leap!
ComicInfo.Summary: Look Before You Leap!: Spider-Man and Human Torch team up to stop Speed Demon, and they are about to get help from a new hero... Leap Frog!?!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:41:43. [Issue ID 36677]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority

ComicInfo.Writer: J.M. DeMatteis,J. M. DeMatteis,J. M. DeMatteis
